actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend section 203(e)(1)(a) of the Federal-State Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 1970 (as amended) with respect to the determination of the insured unemployment rate.

summary.text: Amends the Federal-State Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 1970 to redefine the "rate of insured unemployment," for purposes of determining extended unemployment benefit periods, as the percent obtained by dividing the average weekly number of individuals filing claims for compensation including regular, extended, and sharable regular compensation (currently limited to regular compensation) by the average monthly covered employment for the specified period.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 203(e)(1)(a) of the Federal-State Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 1970 (as amended) with respect to the determination of the insured unemployment rate.
